thread.title: Aimé Leon Dore Launches Winter-Ready Polar Fleece Capsule Collection
thread.title_full: Aimé Leon Dore Launches Winter-Ready Polar Fleece Capsule Collection

author: Marcus Cho
title: Aimé Leon Dore Launches Winter-Ready Polar Fleece Capsule Collection
text:
Visit the original post to see all 18 images from this gallery. 
Shortly after its successful capsule collaboration with KITH , Aimé Leon Dore is releasing a new set of winter essentials perfect for combating the rough temperatures.
Aptly titled the “Polar Fleece” capsule, the new set features silhouettes such as trench boats, hoodies, crewnecks and more, with the main feature of the collection being a polar fleece material made for superior warmth. One special item to look out for in the capsule is the “Q44” sneaker, a made-in-Portugal product offering luxurious navy suede leather for a premium look and feel.
The full capsule is now available online at Aimé Leon Dore’s official site.
